participant_1.background:
I have my family members in my heart, even if I've never met them.
my inspiration is clasical music.
i do not talk a lot.
I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.
I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.

participant_2.background:
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.
My family is very supportive of my writing.
I am close to my family and we often listen to music together.
I drove my van to a music festival and met a group of people who made me try new things.
i am looking to start a business.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to?
Hey, not much. Just writing a piece for work. What about you?
I am walking dogs for my clients. Do you like music?
I love music! I go to a lot of music festivals.
That is so cool! I wish I could go more often.
You should! It's a great way to meet new people and try new things.
I agree. I think I will go to one next summer.
That's great! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I especially like classical music.
Me too! I love how it can be so peaceful and relaxing, but also so powerful and emotional.
Yes! It's the best. Do you play any instruments?
No, I don't. I wish I could, but I'm not very coordinated.
That's okay. I can't play any instruments either.
Well, we can both enjoy music together!
Yes! We can listen to music and write about it.
That would be great! I'm sure we could come up with some really creative ideas.
